title: TMDB Movie
description: This is a web application for browsing movies built using React and styled with SCSS. It allows users to search for movies, view details about individual movies, and save their favorite movies to a watchlist. The app includes various reusable components such as a button, footer, header, hero slider, input, modal, movie card, movie grid, and movie list, all of which are designed with responsive web design principles in mind.

title: Mapty
description: Mapty is a Live workout tracker that allows users to track their running and cycling workouts on a live map. It is powered by the Leaflet API, a popular open-source library for interactive maps.

title: React TO-DO app
description: This is a simple to-do list application built using React and Vite. Users can add tasks to a list, mark tasks as complete, and remove tasks from the list. Additionally, the application features accent color changing and light and dark mode functionalities for a more customizable experience.

title: Tesla Clone
description: This is a simple Clone of the Tesla Website, made using React + Redux and styled using styled components. Check out the live demo here.

title: CSS Trickies
description: This repo has some cool CSS tricks, tips and elements I've configured and personalized! Do check this out! .
